html: Water. The land will be reduced to a miserable condition by the ravages of Sennacherib. (Haydock)— The following was a sabbatical year, ver. 23., and chap. xxxvii. 30.—Teacher. It seems that Isaias, &c., had been silent. He spoke after Ezechias had sent for him, and God promises that the people shall not be left without guides. (Calmet)— Christ will not abandon his Church. (Menochius)
